Class dips

java.lang.Object
  dips

public class dips
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements various functions for example:: RGB to Gray scale conversion,Thresholding,Scaling,Edge detection.

Parameters:
pi - It is Object of PlanarImage of input image
fname - It is name of image stored in .JPG extension
Returns:
src It returns PlanarImage obect of the image converted to Gray scale .

public static void magnify(java.lang.String imag,
                           java.lang.String out,
                           float factor)
This method Scales/magnify the input image and store image as imag.

Parameters:
imag - It is name of input image file in .JPG extension before crop.
out - It is name of output image of file in .JPG extension after crop.
factor - It is scaling factor

threshold

public static javax.media.jai.PlanarImage threshold(javax.media.jai.PlanarImage pi,
                                                    int limit,
                                                    java.lang.String outfile)
This method thresholds the input image and is called from thresholding() ,store image as "threshold.jpg".

Parameters:
pi - It is Object of PlanarImage of input image .TYPE :PlanarImage
limit - Threshold limit for thresholding .TYPE :int
outfile - It is name of output file to store threshold image .TYPE :String
Returns:
res It returns PlanarImage obect of the image thresholded .

                                                    java.lang.String name)
This method helps filter() function and stores image as name.

Parameters:
pi - It is Object of PlanarImage of input image
name - It is name of image to be stored in .JPG extension
submat - It is the filter matrix
Returns:
output11 It returns PlanarImage obect of the image with line detected .

filter

public static javax.media.jai.PlanarImage filter(javax.media.jai.PlanarImage pi,
                                                 java.lang.String fname)
This method applies all filter on input image and store it as "hori.jpg" for horizontal line ,"ver.jpg" for vertical line,"p45.jpg" for line at +45 ,"n45.jpg" for line at -45,"edge1.jpg" for all lines.

Parameters:
pi - It is Object of PlanarImage of input image
fname - It is name of image stored in .JPG extension
Returns:
output1 It returns PlanarImage obect of the image with lines detected .
